title: My friend lost champs...
body: My friend, currently lvl6, lost varus after leveling up to lvl 6. Is this a bug, or is it just normal? Thanks.

replies.body: Thx for all the help anyways
Did he make the purchase with RP or IP?

no 2 weeks before he bought  Varus & later on next week  it was free  and this week he is gone seems like he went to fishing as he loves Fish but not sure he might go for stake as well so he must went to hogs breath, and he had no money so he might need to wash dishes to pay them back can you get him back as i feel like he got a job over there and it doesn't suit him as i am his owner -__-
Was it when Varus was on free week?
